title: Evard's Black Tentacles
content:
ncentration

Evard's Black Tentacles is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Evard's Black Tentacles is a Lvl 4 Spell from the Conjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Evard's Black Tentacles Information

Description: Tentacles sprout from the ground, turning the area into Difficult Terrain, attacking and Smothering creatures within. Level: Lvl 4 spell School: Conjuration School Casting Time: Action R
